name: Spite - Legacy
description:
With the celestial gods behind you, fight your way through hordes of plague infected abominations to stop the spread

Spite - Legacy  was developed by "Cog Storm" as a school project over 14 weeks at The Game Assembly in Malmö, Sweden. 

In this project we developed a diablo like game mainly based on the Diablo 3 - monk class.
